text: Ministry of Justice is the state government ministry of Kaduna State, it is concerned with judicial and prosecutorial activities within the state. The Ministry of Justice control the courts system and the prosecuting offices. Aisha Dikko is the Attorney General. == Responsibilities == The Ministry of Justice has the responsibilities on legislative initiatives and their presentation of Knesset and its committees., the ministry works with security department to make sure law and order is maintained, to also controls administration of justice in the state. == References == Category:Ministry of Kaduna State
title: Ministry of Justice (Kaduna State)
